title: IBaseFlangeFeatureData.GetCustomBendAllowance
description: Gets the custom bend allowance object associated with this sheet metal base flange feature.
remarks:
This method is valid only if
IBaseFlangeFeatureData::UseDefaultBendAllowance
is false.
You can change the custom bend allowance after it has been
initialized
. Access the parent sheet metal to do so. See the Examples.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
